      Constructors in org.joml with parameters of type Matrix3f 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix3d(Matrix3f mat)
      Create a new Matrix3d and initialize it with the values from the given matrix.
      Matrix3f(Matrix3f mat)
      Create a new Matrix3f and make it a copy of the given matrix.
      Matrix4f(Matrix3f mat)
      Create a new Matrix4f by setting its uppper left 3x3 submatrix to the values of the given Matrix3f and the rest to identity.
